title: You guys defend the Tank Meta so dearly.
body:
You defend it by saying "Tanks never die now? Well. They're doing their job. Deal with it."

So why are you exact same people complaining when assassins can kill adcs?

Am I the only one seeing a double standard?

"YAY TANKS CAN DO THEIR JOB"

"OH NO ASSASSINS ARE DOING THEIR JOB"
